name: Sick Way
description:
Once your wife sent you to the store for eggs, but some fool knocked you out. You woke up and saw that you are in an abandoned school. It's time for you to get out of here

Game Features:

  • Hardcore
  • Black humor
  • Improve your mindfulness
  • But you will still be killed
  • Cool soundtrack (or not?)
  • You can choose actions
